Product Security Leader

I am a highly skilled and experienced cybersecurity leader with a demonstrated history of success in the automotive and medical device industries. I possess a strong understanding of embedded systems security and a proven ability to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities, including expertise in zero-day defenses. I have led teams to implement robust security solutions, combined with my knowledge of cryptography and secure coding practices, makes me a valuable asset in developing and managing secure systems. Furthermore, my commitment to innovation is evident through my authorship of multiple patents and leading research publications in the field.
